Look, people need to start seeing this. I only see 4 people who have the whole file and are still seeding, but there was more before. They have bailed. If this keeps up, it won't finish, or will take forever to finish. Only one out of those 4 seeders actually has a good speed too, which is making this even more problematic.

got the game downloaded, the game works great, I'm surprise the game works faster then DA:O on my computer. the only thing that seems to be the problem is that I can't save in the "origin" part. (the start and after you meet flemeth when the real story starts) and then I waited for SO long in the loading screen. is there something that I missed or does it have a long load time...or does my computer just suck D:

Can someone tell me where to find the keygen. The crack file is empty and another crack file containes to .exe folders but not keygen. When I make it through the install using a key from another site EA prompts me to activate DA2 and says the code is incorrect...
ok i download it but it doesnt have sound when chars are talking, just subtitles, how to fix that?
